message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your specific needs. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the effort put into creating it, I am offering it to you for $12000. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the quality you've described, $12000 is unfortunately outside of my budget. I'm willing to pay $8000 for the product, which is the maximum I can afford.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate further. I am now offering the product to you for $9500. I hope this revised price aligns better with your financial situation while still compensating us fairly for the value of the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9500 is still a bit high for me. I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us. I'm going to stick with my initial offer of $8000. This is my absolute top limit, and I'm really hoping we can reach an agreement.

I understand your position, Bob, and I respect your budgetary constraints. After reviewing the situation, I am willing to offer the product to you for $9000. This price reflects a fair compromise between the value of the product and your affordability. I hope this revised offer will help us reach an agreement that satisfies both parties.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $9000 is still a bit too high for me.  If we could meet in the middle at $8500, I think we could reach an agreement.  I really want to get this product, but I can't go any higher than that.

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I appreciate your desire to own this product. After considering your latest offer, I am willing to offer the product to you for $8750. This price is a fair compromise and I believe it reflects the value of the product while also being within your budget constraints. I hope this revised offer will lead to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to work with me on this. $8750 is very close, but I'm still a little over my budget. Would you be willing to come down just a little more to $8250? That's the absolute maximum I can afford, and I'm hopeful we can find a solution that works for both of us.

Thank you for your continued interest in our product, Bob. I understand your financial limitations and appreciate your patience in negotiating. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product to you for $8500. This price is reflective of the product's value while also being within your stated budget. I hope this revised offer will facilitate a successful transaction.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but unfortunately, I'm going to have to pass on this offer.  I'm not able to go any higher than my initial offer of $8000.  Good luck finding a buyer!
